title: Nijigaku Rush!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Wow, you made this game, Rina-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yup. It was my summer homework. I’d love for you to playtest it, You-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Of course, of course! Can I pick the character?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Mhmm.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah, this character looks like Chika-chan~ Huh? This looks like Ai-chan......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I based the character designs off of everyone. If you scroll more to the right, you’ll find yourself, You-san......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah! I found it! Alright, I’ll play as her then! I have to enter a name...... okay. Alright, let’s head on an adventure! Oh, I start out at Nijigaku......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yup. If you clear the Nijigaku Dungeon, then you can embark on an adventure.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>......Hey Rina-chan. This dungeon is a bit too difficult, don’t you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>......Really, is that so? Everyone else in Nijigaku has played it before, but no one could escape the dungeon either...... My game is a failure......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>No, no, no, it’s not a failure. It’s really well made. Watch, I’ll be the first one to clear this! Alright, let’s go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Good luck You-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
